$:/xp/html-button/html-dropdown/tags.title: $:/xp/html-button/html-dropdown/tags
$:/xp/html-button/html-dropdown/tags.text:
Section Divisions:
<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/TextEditor/HTMLTags]tag[Section Divisions]!has[draft.of]sort[]]"> <$transclude mode="inline-block"/>
Text Formatting:
<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/TextEditor/HTMLTags]tag[Text Formatting]!has[draft.of]sort[]]"> <$transclude mode="inline-block"/>
Miscellaneous Tags:
<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/TextEditor/HTMLTags]tag[Miscellaneous Tags]!has[draft.of]sort[]]"> <$transclude mode="inline-block"/>
---- <$button tag="a"> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-new-tiddler" tags="$:/tags/TextEditor/HTMLTags [[Miscellaneous Tags]]" text={{$:/language/Buttons/HTMLTags/New/Text}} /> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<> /> <$text text={{$:/language/Buttons/Stamp/Caption/New}}/>

$:/xp/html-button/readme.title: $:/xp/html-button/readme
$:/xp/html-button/readme.text:
A button ({{$:/core/images/html}}) for inserting html codes.

!! See also

* https://www.runoob.com/html/html-quicklist.html
* https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/HTML/Element
